name: An AI Wrote This Horror Story
name_original: An AI Wrote This Horror Story
description:
An AI Wrote This Horror Story is a 5-10 minute Visual Novel made in a few weeks for Themed Horror Game Jam #6.

For this project, I used OpenAI to generate text based on the prompt, "write me a horror story about about an abandoned spacestation". I generated a small handful and then decided to turn this specific script into a Visual Novel.

I started this project around May 17th and sadly a real life incident meant that I wasn't able to work on this between June 1st and June 7th. This means the project is a lot rougher and less polished than I would have liked. I wouldn't mind coming back to this in future to iron out some bugs and add more sound effects.

Note: Please refresh the page if music doesn't immediately play! GameMaker's HTML 5 module sucks and might not play it randomly.
